snippet: SENATOR FOOTE.-A correspondent of the National Intelligencer thus sketches the labors of Senator FOOTE in the pending contest in Mississippi: "The candidate to be selected was the candidate for Governor, HENRY S. FOOTE was selected against his wis...
lead_paragraph: SENATOR FOOTE.-A correspondent of the National Intelligencer thus sketches the labors of Senator FOOTE in the pending contest in Mississippi: "The candidate to be selected was the candidate for Governor, HENRY S. FOOTE was selected against his wish; at the sacrifice of every interest, at the hazard of his life, he took upon himself this herculean task. No man was so Well fitted for this post.
